p: Generally, smallpox and AIDS viruses attack only humans, but in 1995 the first report of a chimpanzee being infected with HIV was reported. Reverse transcription loop-mediated isothermal amplification assay was developed for rapid detection of HIV type 1 (group M) (Hosaka et al. 2009). The 100 % detection limit of HIV-1 RT-LAMP was determined using a standard strain (WHO HIV-1 [97/656]) in octuplicate and found to be 120 copies/ml.
